title: Lowest Military Expenditure
description: In 2023, Haiti had one of the lowest military expenditures in the world, spending only 0.05% of its GDP on the military.

title: Lowest Armed Forces Personnel
description: As of 2020, only 0.02% of Haiti's total labor force was part of the armed forces, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Low Consumption of Iodized Salt
description: In 2017, only 7.5% of households in Haiti consumed iodized salt, indicating a low level of consumption compared to other countries.

title: High Female Headed Households
description: In 2017, 45.1% of households in Haiti were headed by females, one of the highest percentages in the world.
